reviewText: While no subtitles (which are stated on product) I have a general idea what the story is. I have to say it's enjoyable to watch and also the product was on very good shape as stated. I plan on buying from this provider again if I can.
it was not in english  so im lost in it

While it may be a good story with great characters and fine artwork, it has NO sub-titles, NO dub and is in Japanese. So unless you can speak and understand Japanese, you're going to have to do a lot of guessing as to what's going on with the various characters.

I feel this product deserves more love. Being one of the first anime of this 'style' , I still like it today. I have seen many other anime of this type and  I think this gets out shined by some of the more sexual anime. There is no doubt that I would watch this anime again,
